text:
A new Kendall and Kylie lingerie collection for Topshop dropped this week but looking at the sisters’ social media you’d have no idea. The collection was unveiled with just a single Instagram post from Topshop and nothing from either of the Jenners.

The silence from the sisters is strange considering their Instagram pages are filled with updates about new lip kits, modeling contracts and clothing drops — there are even promotions for scientifically dubious items like fit tea and waist trainers.

The Kendall + Kylie lingerie collection is here and we want it all ? #TopshopStyle Click the link in the bio to shop the collection or search "Kendall and Kylie Velvet Bra" at Topshop.com. A post shared by Topshop (@topshop) on Oct 10, 2017 at 9:51am PDT

What’s more, the collection is based on the Jenners’ personal style and features pieces that seem at home in both their wardrobes — soft velvet bralettes, sheer bodysuits and satin shorts that are designed to be worn as standalone pieces.

4 more Previous Next

One reason for the lack of promotion could be the backlash Kendall and Kylie have received in the past. Just this year, the sisters have received heat for their Biggie and Tupac tees, Kylie was accused of stealing another brand’s designs and of course, there was Kendall’s infamous Pepsi ad.

Browse through our favorite pieces from the collection above and shop the full lineup below.

In other news, here’s an exclusive look at A$AP Rocky’s latest GUESS capsule.

Words by Lia McGarrigle News & Culture Editor Berlin-based writer and Rihanna enthusiast.
title: Why Are Kendall & Kylie Silent About Their New Lingerie Drop?
